body:
So, I got home today planing to go on my pc and look at the forums and play TF2,Minecraft, Etc...

As soon as I turned my pc on it started smoking and after I took it apart my mother board was fried my graphics card was split into 2 parts and a bunch of wires were broken.. Idk how this could have happened so this is probably the end of me for awhile now. I'm writing this on my brothers I pad cause my phone is being repaired and I won't receive my phone for a few months lately so I'm completely screwed as of now. So I'm currently looking for a new pc I might do custom so if you guys could shoot me some links please let me now it would be much appreciated! 

Thanks :D
body_tagged:

replies.body:
Where do you live? Are you in need of a mouse, headset or keyboard? What games do you play? Are you going to edit videos? Do you need a DVD drive? What colour theme do you want? 

Answer all these questions and Ill fix a part list on PCPartpicker as soon as I can get on my PC. If you have any questions, my Skype is SevoMC.

replies.body:
Alright, here's a build with no mouse, keyboard or headset. No monitor. 130$ of space left from your budget.

https://ca.pcpartpicker.com/user/SevoPC/saved/#view=9N8kcf

I tried to make it as easy as possible to build, but you still have to do a little bit of research. It will take a decent 3-4 hours, since this is your first time.

Here's a good guide:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0bUghCx9iso
And how to install windows.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0yfz49Zla24

replies.body:
I put a very solid silent and powerfull pc together,for THE price i hope you like THE brands i chose and that THE prices match in your country :)

grafics card: asus strix gtx 970 4gd5
cpu: i7-6700k
ram:crucial 8gb ddr4-2400
hhd:western digital green 1t
ssd:kingston ssdnow v300 120 gb
motherboard:asus maximus viii ranger
power:be quiet! Dark power pro 10 550w 80 plus gold
cpu cooler:noctua nh-d14
case:fractal disign define s black


have fun :)
